forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 49. West southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, a serene autumn sun reigns in an unencumbered blue sky, casting a gentle warmth upon the cityscape. With temperatures set to hover near a comfortable 66 degrees, the lingering whispers of the northwest wind add a refreshing touch to the air, while the mild afternoon brings a gradual descent in temperature to around 60. The clarity of the day is striking, devoid of the usual fog that so often blankets the Bay; instead, it invites a sense of exploration.

As evening approaches, the skies will remain partially cloudy, easing into a tranquil night with lows around 49 degrees. In this inviting weather, a light jacket or a cozy sweater would be advisable for an evening stroll along the Embarcadero, where the reflections of city lights dance upon the water, or perhaps a quiet afternoon spent in one of the city's parks, where the crispness of fall is beginning to interlace with the warmth of the day. A visit to a local café for a steaming cup of coffee or tea may also be just the perfect way to bask in the seasonal charm, as the gentle breezes playfully stir the scents of autumn leaves.
